channel.title: Resumes on Spencer Leslie
channel.description: Recent content in Resumes on Spencer Leslie

item.title: Resume
item.description:
Experience

Customer Service Representative with Parker Staffing at Nintendo, Feburary 2017-Present

I help consumers of Nintendo products in troubleshooting issues such as error code and network problems.

Account Executive with Colonial Life, May 2016-September 2016

Colonial Life at the time when I joined had just open a new territory in Northern Colorado, as of now I do not believe it is still active as I left when it was about to be disolved. I was tasked with seeking out potential prospects and managed my own schedule. I implemented social media strategies using LinkedIn and Twitter to increase my potential clientele.

Intern at Higgin’s Life and Pensions June 2014-August 2014

Personal assistant for the President of the company in Dublin, Ireland. Maintaned and updated their Microsoft Access database, conducted phone calls and set up appointments for existing clients, and shodowed meetings with clients.

Head Macinist at Atoc Inc

Fabricated and machined aluminim and sometime steel parts for specialty bike racks. I also assembled the racks, packaged the racks, and arranged shipping orders.

Volunteer Work

100+ hours at the Fort Collins Bike Co-Op as a Work Night Leader.

Education

Colorado State University Bachelor of Arts: Economics with Philosophy Minor
